概述  软件包   类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

src.main.simpleSearch
类 SimpleSearch

java.lang.Object
  src.main.simpleSearch.SimpleSearch
所有已实现的接口：
Interpretable
直接已知子类：
DateSearch, FileNameSearch, SizeSearch
public abstract class SimpleSearch
extends java.lang.Object
implements Interpretable

          Implements Interpretable
protected abstract  int compareTo(int pos, java.lang.String content)
           
 java.lang.String getContents()
          Implements Interpretable
protected  void process()
          According to the compareTo implemented by derived class get two posistion toResult method keep the result based on the position

protected abstract  void toResult(int pos, int left, int right)

          Get all list from related index

public void update(java.lang.String indexDir,
                   java.lang.String indexFile)
Get all list from related index

参数：
indexDir - index directory
indexFile - index file name

protected void process()
According to the compareTo implemented by derived class get two posistion toResult method keep the result based on the position
